import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './index.scss' import AnimatedLetters from '../AnimatedLetter' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faJava, faCss3, faPython, faHtml5, faJsSquare, faReact } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons' import Loader from 'react-loaders' const About = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') const about_arr=['A', 'b', 'o','u','t',' ','m','e']; const tech_arr=['T','e','c','h',' ','S','t','a','c','k']; const targetText = ['E','x','p','e','r','i','e','n','c','e','s']; useEffect (() => { setTimeout(() => { setLetterClass('text-animate-hover') }, 4000) }, []) return ( <>
